product_name: ASICS GEL-Kayano 20 Road Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Run in comfort! The women's ASICS GEL-Kayano 20 Road-Running Shoes offer cushion and support to keep your feet happy if you're a neutral runner or one who exhibits mild to moderate overpronation. Lightweight, flexible synthetic textile and polyester mesh uppers offer maximum breathability and comfort; memory foam-lined collars mold to each foot for amazing comfort. FluidFit upper technology combines multidirectional stretch-mesh with stretch reinforcements that adapt to your feet, creating a truly customized glovelike fit. Strategically placed stretch materials are used in the uppers to create a personalized, performance fit that reduces buckling and the chance of skin irritation. Wicking polyester linings move excess moisture away from feet and dry fast. FluidRide midsoles provide a combination of bounce back and cushioning without adding cumbersome weight. Forefoot and hindfoot GEL(R) silicone-based cushioning inserts absorb excess shock in all directions for great stability. Dual-density midsoles improve stability and support. Heel Clutching System(TM) exoskeletal heel counters provide improved support and heel fit. High-performance blown rubber outsoles have abrasion-resistant material in the heels; forefoot material cushions and boosts traction. Vertical flex groove in ASICS GEL-Kayano 20 Road-Running Shoes outsoles follows the line of progression throughout the gait cycle to enhance gait efficiency. The women's ASICS GEL-Kayano 20 Road-Running Shoes proudly carry the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association.
short_description: Run in comfort! The women's ASICS GEL-Kayano 20 Road-Running Shoes offer cushion and support to keep your feet happy if you're a neutral runner or one who exhibits mild to moderate overpronation.
